name: David Letterman
monologue: About Libya, President Obama says we’re staying for a short time and then leaving. That’s what my relatives always say.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: President Obama gave a nationally televised speech about Libya. The speech was titled, “No, I wasn’t born there.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: It’s been reported that a doctor removed fat from Moammar Gadhafi’s belly and injected it into his face. The doctor called it “Operation Not Helping.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Donald Trump called George W. Bush “the worst president in the history of the United States.” Then he added, “Until, of course, I’m elected.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: A new study shows that women start to feel old at 29, but men don’t feel old until they’re 58. This explains at least two of Larry King’s marriages.

name: Jay Leno
monologue: President Obama addressed the nation on Libya. This changes his previous policy on Libya, which was, “don't ask, don't tell.”

name: Jay Leno
monologue: Instead of calling our mission in Libya a war, the White House is calling it a "kinetic military action," which sounds better than "potentially endless quagmire."

name: Jay Leno
monologue: In the wake of record losses, the U.S. Postal Service announced it is cutting 7,500 jobs. But a spokesman for the post office said those positions could be restored if this whole email thing turns out to be nothing but a fad.

name: Jay Leno
monologue: The inventor of super glue has passed away at the age of 94. The service will be closed casket, unless they can somehow pry it open.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: President Obama said the United States has clear and focused goals in Libya. He said he would share those goals with us as soon as Hillary shares them with him.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: Apparently, companies have been accepting job applications on Twitter. If you can fit your resume into 140 characters, you didn’t get the job.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: The Bronx Zoo had to close its reptile house after a poisonous snake went missing. Apparently, the snake had been digging a tunnel for years and hiding it behind a poster of a sexy eel.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: A reporter in Florida said he was forced into a closet by Joe Biden’s staff to keep him from talking to guests at a fundraiser. He said it wouldn’t have been so bad if Biden wasn’t already in there for the same reason.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: President Obama escalated the war in Afghanistan, he sent the Navy in to shoot at pirates in the Indian Ocean, and now he’s attacking Libya. It’s like he took the Nobel Peace Prize as an insult.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Obama wanted to update the American people on Libya but unless Snooki is going to Libya, the American people don’t care.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: I love “Dancing With the Stars.” It combines my love of ballroom dancing with my love for Ralph Macchio like no other show can.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Happy birthday to Lady Gaga. Twenty-five years ago, baby Gaga came out of an egg wearing nothing but a onesie made of chicken cutlets.
